infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos for users profile, their posts
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show vendors' or musicians' cards which are near by you
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show vendors' or musicians' cards which are near by you
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses you photo library to make choosing photos for your future post in easier way
infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app uses the documents folder to get necessary files for sharing
infoPlist.NSDownloadsFolderUsageDescription: This app uses the downloads folder to get necessary files for sharing
infoPlist.NSFileProviderDomainUsageDescription: This app uses the file provider to get necessary files for sharing
infoPlist.NSIdentityUsageDescription: This app uses the wallet to make payments via app
